comments.comment: Life truly is full circle. Pewds screaming "I DONT CARE" in happy wheels to his "son" and now actually going on a bike ride with his actual son. Brings a tear to my eye
pewdiepie slowly becoming a channel i can watch with my family is so surreal
pewdiepie is a real example of we made the right person famous

I don't watch you as much these days and you likely won't see this comment among the thousands but it's heartwarming to see your family doing well and it was so nice growing up watching you, you've practically helped raise a generation and this video shows you'll do an even better job with your son.
I can see it now. Him going down a hill on the back of the bike, screaming “DAD” and Felix yelling back “I DONT CARE!”
My favorite character arc is how PewDiePie videos went from being the most unhinged videos on youtube to the most wholesome.
Ahh… so that was it. All these years, the struggles, the controversy, the wedding, the child, everything was for a Happy Wheels reference.
Pewdiepie was like a father to us, now he really is a father.
Pewds really living life to it's fullest, so happy for him.
I love how gentle Felix is with Bjorn. It heals my inner child.

I’m Japanese and kinda still crazy that “Mr. YouTube” visits places I’ve been to or I’ve seen on TV shows. Really satisfying to see him & his family enjoy these places. Thank you for making videos that everyone can enjoy.
To see Felix go from "BARRELS!" to full dad mode is amazing to see in real time over the years. Much deserved! <3
I love that you guys involve Björn so much in your travel and outdoor activities, it will be so good for his mental development to have so many memories as a family spending time exploring
I was born into a very Dysfunctional family but seeing Felix and / or Marzia with their Boy warms my heart, Björn is lucky to Have parents like them - this video Warms my heart
Seeing Felix, Marzia and Bjorn just live their happy little lives after seeing them all grow from the start just makes me cry ngl.

I’m really happy for pewds I remember watching him as a kid and just having a good time. Now he’s a dad and is essentially retired and enjoying life in Japan, I wish him all the happiness in the world:)
"front flip" was something Felix always yelled when playing Happy Wheels more than a Decade ago. It's nice to see he's still in touch with his past and never forgot where he came from.
Cutest little acorn ever. I love his “voice”. Marzia… your editing is gorgeous.  Love to watch your family adventures in such an amazing place!
Pretty soon he’s going to audition for the Dad and happy wheels

Felix channel is just an part of our life now. I come to watch his videos everytime i feel like not living. So many memories with this man and now he have a kid and i just cant express how happy it makes me
The shots from Björn's birthday are just the most heartwarming thing ever. It even feels a little intrusive to be watching such a beautiful family moment. Thanks for letting us in!
Love that he laughs so much at other children falling down but protects his son with his life! love you pewds
Pewdiepie literally lives the peak life. He managed to survive the internet, make a happy family, live in Japan, pursue multiple hobbies, etc.
幸せそうな姿を見せられるとこっちまで笑顔になるぜ
14 years later and Felix retired in most gracious way imaginable living the dream in Japan
Marzia is amazing at editing and I've always loved her aesthetic. Watching happy family moments gives me deep yearning for something like this. I hope you guys have many more happy and lovely days.
He’s so in love with that little boy, it makes my heart melt 🥹 Prayers to the family.
This is the first Pewds video I've seen in years, I love how wholesome and gentle he is with his family, it's super sweet
9:46 i LOVE this pause where felix thinks the triangle is gonna actually go in the square hole, followed by immediately continuing his sentence when thankfully realises it actually doesn't
Pewdiepie avoiding all controversies and living his best life

幸せな映像すぎて泣いた。
なんてあたたかい家庭なんだ...
この幸せが永遠のものでありますように

I discovered Felix channel 11 years ago at age 48. Now at 59 yrs. old, I still enjoy watching him, and his family now more than ever. He is one of the good ones. Thanks for being such a great person Felix.
While the internet community is still in chaos due to so many dramas, Pewdiepie still lives a very normal but happy life, I like this peace
As a person who grew up with Felix's Amnesia videos and every video ever since it truly heals my heart to see Felix and Marzia being so happy with their beautiful son

7:50 "dada dada da!"

OMG MY POOR LITTLE HEART ITS SO PRECIOUS

ig ive sorta kept up with how he's doing but i havent actually sat down and watched a pewdiepie video in years tbh. saw some post and figured id come check on him real quick but i actually ended up watching this whole video smiling ear to ear almost crying. its like i watched my child hood friend grow up and im proud of him. much love felix, thanks for all those years
Didnt expect to feel weirdly emotional seeing Jack holding Bjorn. Two strangers but somehow the meaning has such depth. Truly a wholesome moment.

When I was a kid and you first uploaded the Happy Wheels videos, I'd reference the FRONTFLIP bit with my mom and she'd laugh and laugh, thought it was the funniest thing ever. She died of cancer at age 46, wild to think that so much time he gone by that now you're raising a kid of your own and making that reference again. That joke meant a lot to her, and I've always appreciated it.
I swear watching Pewds living such a peaceful life , away from all the drama heals something in me. I used to watch homie play amnesia religiously

being a parent is so challenging. you and marzia are doing such a great job. He’s so happy and exceeding his milestones! thank you for sharing these magical moments! please don’t forget to enjoy being present- they grow up so fast!
Filmmakers should study this. This is so well edited and so authentic

You used to give me my childhood, and now you give me fond memories...
You motivated me to start my own channel, thank you pewdie
Felix gives off such hopecore vibes these days it’s almost motivating

i love going from being 12 years old watching pewdiepie after school to being 24 now with a 9 month old of my own coming back to channels and seeing the progress everyone and everything has made. this is beautiful

I know social media is fake and everything is rigged… but genuinely… his kid looks like he’s having an amazing childhood. They’re giving him everything and more in the most beautiful way. I love that.
Little Bjorn looks so much like his dad, on the close up at 4:27 hes really reminding me of Felix when he was young
As a child I grew up in a very toxic household but it completely warms my heart to see the both of you being such amazingly sweet parents. ️
I can't believe this whole thing started with Marzia stream sniping Felix

You're healing generations of family drama, its so beautiful to see a multicultural family live their lives so uniquely yet so simple. Congrats, Felix and Marzia. You're the embodiment of how our generations should see the world.
9:34 Edgar is looking at his family with happiness, I am sure he missing Maya <3
I'm tearing up so happy for you pewds
bro im crying this is so cute man. seeing felix this grown is crazy. having a mini version of him. this makes me happy to see him like that

My baby girl turns 1 in October! It was special to me I ended up having my baby so close to Felix and Marzia having theirs. I grew up watching Pewdiepie as a kid, and now we’re both parents to our own children. Pretty incredible. Can’t say I’ve watched anyone else this long. What a journey 🩷
Bjorn smelling the flower @ 12:45 is the cutest!!
Pewdiepie is absolutely a great person filled with hapiness
Pewdiepie… a channel about doing life correctly. Got me out of some really bad times and is just so wholesome now.
Bjorn saying daddy was so cute omg he’s precious and his giggles thank you Felix for sharing these clips with us 🫶

Actually insane, going from being a 12 year old boy watching your Happy Wheels vids to laugh

To now being a 27 year old man, barely able to find the time to watch, just seeing Felix's life grow along with my own

Its beautiful, for real

I grew up watching pewds and marzia and they always brought me so much comfort….now it’s years later and I have a family of my own (sons a year and 5months) and they are also in the beginning stages of their family. It warms my heart <3
Pewdiepie quite literally living his best life with the people he loves in 4k
In all the shitty things happening in the creator space, having pewds enjoying his life and sharing some snippets of it for us is a nice change of pace.
Love the development of the channel throughout the years. You just know this is the live happily forever after phase.

ビョルンくんかわいいすぎて️！
一歳のお誕生日おめでとう家族で素敵な一年を過ごして下さい。
Finally, Happy Wheels in real life with little Bjorn

While all these other YouTubers are getting exposed as frauds, Pewdiepie’s winning at life in Japan

Truly the greatest YouTuber of all time
Björn wins "Craziest dad lore" for sure
I don't know why seeing Pewds living his life happily makes me so happy. God bless him and his family.
When Felix did that Happy Wheels reference, i genuinely had to tear up it's crazy how far this man has gotten and he's now living his best life.
Pewd audience is so boomer today.. and I kind of love it. Feels like we grew up with the internet, with pewdiepie, with all these memories.
Crying happy tears watching the man that taught me there was more to life then my struggles while he screamed “BARRELS” at me now happily living with a whole new purpose in life

Considering the mess that Mr. Beast and his corporation are turning out to be, I think we can say with complete accuracy that Felix being dethroned as the biggest YouTuber was the end of the rule of wholesome content on YouTube. Felix is just a good guy who made us laugh, and I for one believe he earned every second of the time I spent on him.
16:28 it has truly come full circle... you genuinely have the most beautiful family Felix, i strive to share the same life style you do and i am so happy for you and your family :)
Im happy you managed to stay good and humble all these years and “retire” so early. Wishing you and your family all the love and happiness Felix!
22:39 Its so funny how mugi stared after getting caught loving Bjorn.
I remember watching pewdiepie at like 2am on a school night every night now I’m 26 and watching him with his first child. I could cry.
Proud of you and Marzia! Love from Belgium!
Seeing and hearing Pewdie saying “I don’t care.” on the bike with Bjorn really takes me back. I feel so happy for this man :)

"Happiness."

That word perfectly describes this video.
Bjorn would definitely tell the "craziest dad lore" to his friends someday

Björn is so adorable.
I kept smiling when I saw his birthday footage.

You guys are so lucky.
All the best to you and your family
If you think about it, if Pewds never created this channel, he wouldn't have met Marzia, lived in Japan, or have Bjorn. This channel is truly a blessing.
As a fellow dad gang member, this warms my heart to see how much Felix has grown into this family man. Blessings to you and your family, Bro! ️
Felix legit finished the main anime, started an OVA, then the OVA became its own slice of life anime and I'm here for it
These vlogs feel like a sigh you let out while relaxing on the beach, watching the stars pop up in the sky, in a warm summer night.
この素敵な家族が、これからも安全に生活し続けられる日本でありますように
I actually cried watching this. I'm soo happy for pewds and everything he's been blessed with. Watching him happy makes my heart feel joy too.

Just proud I got to see your story arch over the past decade and a half,  and it has a happy ending.  

Thanks pewds.  You’re a man of great character, culture, and honor.  Something we can all strive for.

Congrats pewds. This is gonna be a memory with him for a while. Glad to see you having fun with your family. I wont talk about being early like the other mindless children. Im really happy to see you do stuff like this. I hope you and your family the best.
“6’5, blue eyes, trust fund” perfect description I was dead
I love that pewds has moved from gaming to being a loving father and sharing the happy family life we should all strive for.

Pewds is the guy who supported YouTube on his back single handedly... The guy who made us laugh when we were younger. He is the true king of YouTube who retired WITHOUT any sort of drama or involvement in controversies. And now he is living his dream, with his beloved wife and child.
Im glad that pewds is sharing this with us,  so heartwarming
i was 17 when i used to watch this guy , I'm 25 now . Im proud of bro
Pewds being a Good father. it makes me happy. From Horror and fun Gamer to a loving Dad living life

3:40 Remember Felix. As a dad, you are now obliged to blame whatever child or animal is nearby when you burp or fart. It doesn’t have to be the closest thing to you, as long as it’s in sight it’s blame-able
This is the most wholesome content on YouTube, I’m just so happy seeing how happy pewds and his family is
I love how this channel went from gaming to memes to family vlogs.  So wholesome!
can't believe he's already 1 year old, gonna make a bro cry bud. Happy birthday little gamer :) I love seeing your family vlogs and it's lovely to see Marzia more :) such a wholesome family!

Pewds has the happy ending.

It's been fun watching him for much of my life.
Pewds videos is like a very statisfying end credit scenes of a game/movie that we already finish untill the end and we secretly hoping theres more of it
I can tell how fatherhood is facing Felix with a different set of knowledge and learnings to come, its very humbling to experience being a new parent! its good to see him under that light now.
Pewds singlehandedly awakening my desire to have a family
so wholesome seeing pewds raise his son i knew hed be a good dad after all he raised me and many other bros
Watching Pewdiepie for a decade is like a father giving me memories. Now watching him and Bjorn's journey throughout their lives is like being their guardian angel.

When the part with his 1st birthday came on that blew my mind. Times been flying by so fast, and you two have been married even longer lol. Its zooming by. I hope you 3 are living your best lives. Thank you for making our childhoods Felix
10:23 Not Edgar and Momo watching Bjorn like we also want new toys
9:50 not me saying “That’s right! It goes to the square hole!”
13:27 she is super lucky to be with y'all cuz she knows that she's getting so much lovin care from you Marzia & Bjorn.
Pewds, been following you since the Amnesia days and could not be happier seeing you with your little boy and Marzia being a wholesome family, wishing you all the good in the wold :)

I grew up watching both PewDiePie and Marzia. These 2 have made my heart so happy just within themselves and now getting to see little vlogs of them with their baby just makes me have so many heart feels.  Seriously truly lots of love for your family if you ever see this Pewds and fam.  Truly blessed. Growing up sure is a crazy thing with different adventures in themselves if we search for it. Wishing all so much love.
I'm so proud of you man... You become a dad... A trusted dad...

This is so beautiful, PewDiePie enjoying his life and retirement spending well needed and deserved time with his beloved child and not giving a damn of what happens online and staying out of drama to have a peaceful life and give his son an amazing childhood and life, very heartwarming
I like the pewdiepie ark. A true growth in not ownly in career but life.
I'm very happy for pewds, marzia and bjorn. They're very happy and a great family. I hope they get everything they want from life.
Man Pewds has gone through some mad character development. Bless.
its so crazy to see all the youtubers ive grown up watching, have kids and start a life with their families.. its so amazing to me

I haven’t watched your stuff in 10 years because I believe the quality deteriorated, but it’s seriously wonderful seeing you’ve got a baby boy now, and referencing I DON’T CAAAARE, my first memory of PewDiePie.
Congratulations, mate.
You can tell how happy and cared for Bjorn is, wonderful happy family
So proud of Pewds for living a happy life instead of being a PDF like most YouTubers this year.
Pewds family vlogs just heals me internally
These vlogs are top tier happiness and I am so here for it. What the world needs more of.
Man his character development is insane
not him doing the most dad walk ever at 2:49

Bjorn is growing up so fast into a little man.

Also, footage of the Joey the Manga Boy bouldering. POG

It's crazy how fast time goes by. It feels like Björn was born so recently and he is growing so so fast. It is beautiful to see and be a part of that journey. The fact that Björn is slowly starting to speak is crazy and heartwarming to see. Much love to Felix, Marzia, Björn and the entire family including the cute doggos!!
Seeing pewds and his kid riding a bicycle together reminds me of his happy wheels era. We come full circle bois
I get brought to tears in all of these vlogs seeing how good of a upbringing Björn gets. I'm happy for you guys.

I love the happy wheels reference you made with your son, really takes me back. Thank you for these 14 years of content felix, all us previous 9 year olds are still here to watch and enjoy and be happy for your life.
It's so nice seeing Pewds just have fun with his family, instead of stressing over uploads. Felix has entertained me for over 10 years and I couldn't be prouder of him
Seeing pewdiepie growing from 2011 to 2024 is really something different
Felix is a super dad, he is so cool, affectionate, and funny. He is and inspiring person and a role model for young man. God bless him and his family
6:45 why every dad does that  it's so funny
Yeap can confirm, this is Happy Wheels playthrough in real life.
